alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:53AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG IN THE LOWER PIEDMONT THIS MORNING... Moist surface conditions persist ahead of a cold front slowly working through the Carolina and Georgia Piedmont this morning. Fog formed overnight in some areas, and a few spots will see visibility of less than a half mile. This fog should dissipate as the cold front sinks southward, bringing drier air to the Piedmont. Some areas of fog will be seen through 8 AM. Drivers on area roadways are advised to use extra caution, and be prepared for rapid changes in visibility. Use low-beam headlights and leave more space between vehicles than usual.
